Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.coord

Interface Summary
IAeCoordinationId Interface to access coordination context identifier.
IAeProtocolStateTable Interface for a protocol state transition table.
 

Class Summary
AeContextBase Base class for simple property based context implementations.
AeCoordinatingBase Base class for any object that is participating in a coordinated activity.
AeCoordinationContext Simple imlementation of a coordination context.
AeCoordinationFactory Factory to create objects needed for the coordination framework.
AeCoordinationManager Base class of the coordination manager implementation.
AeCoordinationMessageDispatchWork Wraps the protcol message in a Work impl so that it can be dispatched asynchronously.
AeCoordinationMessageProcessEnqueueWork Wraps the protcol message in a Work impl so that it can be queued asynchronously to the (sub) process's execution queue.
AeCreateContextRequest Basic implementation of the create context request.
AeCreateContextResponse Basic implementation of a create context response.
AeInMemoryCoordinationId Class to construct a coordination id based on the process id and the invoke acitivity's location path.
AeInMemoryCoordinationManager In mememory implementation of a coordination manager.
AePersistentCoordinationId Class to construct a coordination id based on a id value generated by the storage layer.
AePersistentCoordinationManager Persistent Coordination manager implementation.
AeProcessExecutionQueueMessageWrapper Wraps the protcol message in a Runnable so that it can be enqueued to a process's execution queue.
AeProtocolMessage Basic implementation of the coordination protocol message.
AeProtocolState Implementation of the coordination protocol state.
AeRegistrationRequest Simple implementation of the registration request.
AeRegistrationResponse Basic implementation of a registration response.
